sen.j: 駒田忍人（こまだのおしひと、生没年不明）は、日本の飛鳥時代の人物である。
sen.e: KOMADA no Oshihito (date of birth and death unknown) lived in the Asuka period in Japan.
KOMADA no Oshihito (date of birth and death unknown) lived during Japan's Asuka period.
sen.cmt: 他ファイルのネイティブチェックを参考に修正しました。
sen.e: KOMADA no Oshihito (date of birth and death unknown) lived during Japan's Asuka period.

sen.j: 旧仮名遣いでの読みは「こまだのおしひと」で同じ。
sen.e: His name is also pronounced "KOMADA no Oshihito" in old Japanese syllabary characters.
In the old Japanese kana syllabary. too, his name is pronounced "KOMADA no Oshihito."
sen.cmt: 「同じ」の意をわかりやすくしました。
sen.e: In the old Japanese kana syllabary, his name is also pronounced as "KOMADA no Oshihito."
His hereditary title was Sukuri (one of the lower title under Yamato dynasty).
His hereditary title was Sukuri (one of the lower title under Yamato dynasty).
His hereditary title was Sukuri (one of the lower title under Yamato dynasty).

sen.j: 672年の壬申の乱で、都を脱出した大津皇子に同行した。
sen.e: He accompanied Prince Otsu who escaped from the capital in the Jinshin War in 672.
He accompanied Prince Otsu in his escape from the capital in the Jinshin War of 672.
sen.cmt: 他ファイルのネイティブチェックを参考に修正しました。
sen.e: He accompanied Prince Otsu in his escape from the capital in the Jinshin War of 672.

sen.j: 駒田氏がどんな氏族であったかかは不明である。
sen.e: Details of Komada clan is unknown.
Details of Komada clan is unknown.
Details of Komada clan is unknown.

sen.j: 壬申の乱の勃発時、忍人は近江宮がある大津市にいたらしい。
sen.e: It is believed that Oshihito was in Otsu City where Omi no miya was located when the Jinshin War started,
It is believed that Oshihito was in Otsu where Omi no miya was located when the Jinshin War started.
sen.cmt: リンク表記で「大津市」となっていますが当時は「大津」なので（web表記も「大津」）、Cityは削除しました。
sen.e: It is believed that Oshihito was in Otsu where Omi no miya was located when the Jinshin War started.

sen.j: 天武天皇が挙兵したとき、その子高市皇子と大津皇子は敵の本拠である大津を脱し、二手に分かれて父のあとを追った。
sen.e: When the Emperor Tenmu raised his army, his children, Prince Takechi and Otsu, escaped from Otsu where the enemy's headquarter was located and ran after their father splitting in two groups.
When Emperor Tenmu raised his army, his children, Princes Takechi and Otsu, escaped from Otsu where the enemy's headquarters was located and ran after their father separately in two groups.
sen.cmt: the Emperorのtheを削除し、Prince を複数にしました。
sen.e: When Emperor Tenmu raised his army, his children, Princes Takechi and Otsu, escaped from Otsu where the enemy's headquarters was located and ran after their father separately in two groups.

sen.j: 大津皇子の一行は25日深夜に伊勢国の鈴鹿関に到達し、翌朝朝明郡の迹太川の辺で合流を果たした。
sen.e: Prince Otsu's party arrived at the Suzuka-no-seki Checkpoint in Ise at midnight of 25th and joined his father's party next morning around Toho-gawa River.
Prince Otsu's party arrived at the Suzuka-no-seki Checkpoint in Ise Province at midnight of 25th and joined his father's party next morning at the bank of Toho-gawa River in Asake-no-kori county.
Prince Otsu's party arrived at the Suzuka-no-seki Checkpoint in Ise Province at midnight of 25th and joined his father's party next morning at the bank of Toho-gawa River in Asake-no-kori county.

sen.j: 駒田忍人はこの一行の中にいた。
sen.e: KOMADA no Oshihito was in this party.
KOMADA no Oshihito was in this party.
KOMADA no Oshihito was in this party.

sen.j: ともに朝明郡にたどりついたのは、大分恵尺、難波三綱、山辺安摩呂、小墾田猪手、埿部視枳、大分稚臣、根金身、漆部友背であった。
sen.e: The followers who got to Asake-no-kori county were OKIDA no Esaka, NANIWA no Mitsuna, YAMAHE no Yasumaro, OHARITA no Ite, HATSUKASHIBE no Shiki, OKIDA no Wakaomi, NE no Kanemi and NURIBE no Tomose.
The followers who got to Asake-no-kori county were OKIDA no Esaka, NANIWA no Mitsuna, YAMAHE no Yasumaro, OHARITA no Ite, HATSUKASHIBE no Shiki, OKIDA no Wakaomi, NE no Kanemi and NURIBE no Tomose.
The followers who got to Asake-no-kori county were OKIDA no Esaka, NANIWA no Mitsuna, YAMAHE no Yasumaro, OHARITA no Ite, HATSUKASHIBE no Shiki, OKIDA no Wakaomi, NE no Kanemi and NURIBE no Tomose.

sen.j: この後の内戦で駒田忍人が果たした活動については記録がない。
sen.e: No records of KOMADA no Oshihito's activities in the later domestic warfare were kept.
There is no records of KOMADA no Oshihito' subsequent achievements in this domestic warfare.
sen.cmt: 「この後の内戦」の訳を修正しました。
sen.e: There is no records of KOMADA no Oshihito' subsequent achievements in this domestic warfare.
